entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
